title: I tried to play ESO considering it's FTP and I own it.
body:
Walked into a cave for a quest.

Could not leave the cave because the door didn't work. Other players entering the cave had the same thing happening to them.

The only way out of this cave is to pay money to teleport to a wayshrine.

The nearest wayshrine was on the opposite side of the zone, and I needed to ride a boat outside the cave to progress the quest.

Uninstalled.
